txt.en: 'With the forces of Durthang lessened by your efforts, the threat of the Captain of the Pit has diminished once more. I thank you for your assistance.'

'I am concerned with the tower of Durthang. Since we last spoke, more foes have gathered there. Perhaps the Captain of the Pit is preparing his forces for an assault against us?

'I am not one to wait and see the outcome. We must strike Durthang now.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest. This quest can be completed with one or two adventurers.</rgb>
'The time to strike the tower has come. Are you prepared to depart?'

Many foes await those who dare enter the fortress of Durthang, home to the Captain of the Pit.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You should return to Candúr and apprise him of your efforts.
